titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at the funeral of Mrs. Mary Alston, wife to Joseph Alston Esq; who dyed, Jan. 25. and was interred at Chelsey, Feb. 7. 1670. By Adam Littleton, D.D. Recton of Chelsey.
titleStmt.author: Littleton, Adam, 1627-1694.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect, apparently missing one preliminary leaf.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
